About

Save the web developers from my own affordable WYSIWYG editor difficulties

Creator of summernote.

Thanks to @lqez for advice and developing django-summernote, the best way to use summernote on django.

Thanks to @rorlab for good idea and developing summernote-rails gem, the best way to use summernote on ruby on rails.

Thanks to @outsideris for developing angular-summernote, the best way to use summernote on angularjs.

About Us

We planed to make web editor for website integration together. so we co-worked remained time for this project.

Our Goal

Save the web developers from my own affordable WYSIWYG editor difficulties.

Suggestion

Help us for coarse english with any suggestion for better code on GitHub Issues.

Summernote v0.5 · Created and Maintained by Alan

Based on Bootstrap and jQuery. Icons from Font Awesome. Theme from bootswatch.

Summernote distributed under the MIT license.
